data.title: Oil and Gas Giant ExxonMobil Turns to Bitcoin (BTC) Mining To Reduce Wasted Energy: Report
data.text: Top US-based fuel producer ExxonMobil is reportedly mining Bitcoin (BTC) in an effort to cut down on wasted energy. According to a CNBC report, ExxonMobil has partnered up with Denver-based energy company Crusoe Energy Systems to mine Bitcoin in North Dakota using technology that repurposes surplus natural gas.
